verses.text: Give \w praise|strong="H1984"\w* \w to|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3050"\w*; \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H0430"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w to|strong="H0430"\w* \w make|strong="H3588"\w* melody \w to|strong="H0430"\w* \w our|strong="H0430"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*; \w praise|strong="H1984"\w* \w is|strong="H0430"\w* pleasing \w and|strong="H0430"\w* beautiful.

\w The|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w building|strong="H1129"\w* \w up|strong="H1129"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*; \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w makes|strong="H3068"\w* all \w the|strong="H3068"\w* outlaws \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* come together.

\w The|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* gives help \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w poor|strong="H6035"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* spirit; \w but|strong="H7563"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* sends sinners \w down|strong="H8213"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* shame.

Make songs \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w praise|strong="H2167"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*; make melody \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* instruments \w of|strong="H0430"\w* music.

\w By|strong="H3559"\w* \w his|strong="H3559"\w* hand \w the|strong="H3680"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* \w is|strong="H0776"\w* \w covered|strong="H3680"\w* \w with|strong="H0776"\w* \w clouds|strong="H5645"\w* \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w rain|strong="H4306"\w* \w is|strong="H0776"\w* stored \w up|strong="H6779"\w* \w for|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3680"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*; \w he|strong="H0776"\w* \w makes|strong="H3559"\w* \w the|strong="H3680"\w* \w grass|strong="H2682"\w* tall \w on|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3680"\w* \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w*.

\w He|strong="H0834"\w* \w gives|strong="H5414"\w* \w food|strong="H3899"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* every \w beast|strong="H0929"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w young|strong="H1121"\w* \w ravens|strong="H6158"\w* \w in|strong="H1121"\w* answer \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w their|strong="H5414"\w* \w cry|strong="H7121"\w*.

\w He|strong="H3808"\w* \w has|strong="H0376"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w delight|strong="H7521"\w* \w in|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* \w strength|strong="H1369"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w a|strong="H3808"\w* \w horse|strong="H5483"\w*; \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w takes|strong="H7521"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w pleasure|strong="H7521"\w* \w in|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* \w legs|strong="H7785"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w a|strong="H3808"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w*.

\w The|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w takes|strong="H7521"\w* \w pleasure|strong="H7521"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* worshippers, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w those|strong="H0853"\w* whose \w hope|strong="H3176"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w mercy|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w has|strong="H3588"\w* \w made|strong="H2388"\w* \w strong|strong="H2388"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* iron bands \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w your|strong="H3588"\w* doors; \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w has|strong="H3588"\w* sent \w blessings|strong="H1288"\w* on \w your|strong="H3588"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w inside|strong="H7130"\w* \w your|strong="H3588"\w* \w walls|strong="H1280"\w*.

\w He|strong="H7760"\w* gives \w peace|strong="H7965"\w* \w in|strong="H2459"\w* all \w your|strong="H7760"\w* \w land|strong="H1366"\w*, making \w your|strong="H7760"\w* stores \w full|strong="H7646"\w* \w of|strong="H1366"\w* \w fat|strong="H2459"\w* \w grain|strong="H2406"\w*.

\w He|strong="H5704"\w* \w sends|strong="H7971"\w* \w out|strong="H7971"\w* \w his|strong="H7971"\w* \w orders|strong="H1697"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*; \w his|strong="H7971"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* goes \w out|strong="H7971"\w* \w quickly|strong="H4120"\w*.

\w He|strong="H5414"\w* \w gives|strong="H5414"\w* \w snow|strong="H7950"\w* \w like|strong="H0665"\w* \w wool|strong="H6785"\w*; \w he|strong="H5414"\w* \w sends|strong="H5414"\w* out ice-drops \w like|strong="H0665"\w* \w dust|strong="H0665"\w*.

\w He|strong="H6440"\w* sends \w down|strong="H7993"\w* \w ice|strong="H7140"\w* \w like|strong="H6440"\w* raindrops: water \w is|strong="H4310"\w* made hard \w by|strong="H6440"\w* \w his|strong="H6440"\w* \w cold|strong="H7135"\w*.

\w At|strong="H7307"\w* \w the|strong="H1697"\w* outgoing \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w his|strong="H7971"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w*, \w the|strong="H1697"\w* ice \w is|strong="H1697"\w* turned \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w*; \w when|strong="H7971"\w* \w he|strong="H7971"\w* \w sends|strong="H7971"\w* \w out|strong="H7971"\w* \w his|strong="H7971"\w* \w wind|strong="H7307"\w*, there \w is|strong="H1697"\w* \w a|strong="H7971"\w* \w flowing|strong="H5140"\w* \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w*.

\w He|strong="H3478"\w* makes \w his|strong="H5046"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* clear \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*, teaching \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w his|strong="H5046"\w* \w laws|strong="H2706"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w his|strong="H5046"\w* \w decisions|strong="H4941"\w*.

\w He|strong="H3651"\w* \w has|strong="H1471"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w these|strong="H3605"\w* \w things|strong="H3605"\w* \w for|strong="H4941"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w other|strong="H3605"\w* \w nation|strong="H1471"\w*: \w and|strong="H4941"\w* \w as|strong="H3651"\w* \w for|strong="H4941"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* laws, \w they|strong="H3651"\w* \w have|strong="H3045"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w knowledge|strong="H3045"\w* \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w them|strong="H6213"\w*. \w Let|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3050"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w praised|strong="H1984"\w*.
